Heroes

AXISJ has many heroes.

The world is beautiful because of these.

Thanks all

Heroes

We are recruiting hero who make a commitment in AXISJ. If you find any hidden hero, please let us know by email (tom@axisj.com)

Developer Heroes

This is given to the one who tries to promote AXISJ by committing source code, responding to Github issue tracker and AXISJ development tutorials.

Design Heroes

This is given to the one who helps and improves UI design and CSS of AXISJ.

Marketer Heroes

This is given to the one who actively promotes AXISJ through social media and AXISJ introduction tutorials and etc.

Donation Heroes

This is given to the one who helps AXISJ physically by some donation.

Company Heroes

Companies that have sponsored AXISJ
